de.agilecoders.wicket.less

Class LessPackageResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.AbstractResource
      • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.PackageResource
        • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.CssPackageResource
          • de.agilecoders.wicket.less.LessPackageResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.wicket.request.resource.caching.IStaticCacheableResource, org.apache.wicket.request.resource.IResource, org.apache.wicket.util.io.IClusterable

    public class LessPackageResource
extends org.apache.wicket.request.resource.CssPackageResource
    Package resource for css files. It strips comments and whitespace from css.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    miha
    See Also:

                   String name,
                   Locale locale,
                   String style,
                   String variation,
                   LessCompilable lessCompilable)
        Construct.
        Parameters:
        scope - This argument will be used to get the class loader for loading the package resource, and to determine what package it is in
        name - The relative path to the resource
        locale - The locale of the resource
        style - The style of the resource
        variation - The component's variation (of the style)

      • getCompiler

        protected IBootstrapLessCompiler getCompiler()
        Gets the BootstrapLessCompiler to be used. By default returns the configured compiler on application level, but can be overriden by the user application to provide compiler specific to the resource.
        Returns:
        the configured application level less compiler. May be null.
